# Review Guide

Thank you for reviewing the Incial website! This guide will help you provide valuable feedback.

## How to Report Issues

1. Go to [Issues](https://github.com/incial/Incial-web/issues/new/choose)
2. Select **ðŸ” Review / Feedback** template
3. Fill out the form with as much detail as possible
4. Add screenshots or screen recordings (drag & drop into the textarea)
5. Submit the issue

## What to Review

### ðŸŽ¨ Design & UI
- Does the design match the Figma mockups?
- Are colors, fonts, and spacing consistent?
- Do animations feel smooth and intentional?
- Are hover states, focus states, and interactions working?

### ðŸ“± Responsiveness
- **Mobile** (320px - 640px): Test on iPhone, Android
- **Tablet** (641px - 1024px): Test on iPad, Android tablets
- **Desktop** (1025px+): Test on laptop and large monitors
- Check for:
  - Text readability
  - Images scaling properly
  - No horizontal scrollbar
  - Touch targets â‰¥ 44px on mobile

### â™¿ Accessibility
- Can you navigate the entire site with keyboard only (Tab, Enter, Escape)?
- Are all interactive elements accessible?
- Is there sufficient color contrast for text?
- Do images have alt text?

### ðŸ”— Functionality
- Do all links work and go to the right place?
- Do forms submit correctly?
- Are buttons and CTAs clickable and functional?
- Does navigation work smoothly?
- Do animations trigger correctly?

### âš¡ Performance
- Does the page load quickly?
- Are there any laggy animations?
- Do images load progressively?
- Any console errors? (Open DevTools â†’ Console tab)

### ðŸ“ Content
- Typos, grammar issues, or awkward phrasing
- Missing content or placeholder text
- Broken images or missing assets

## Testing Browsers

Please test on at least 2 of these:
- âœ… Chrome (recommended)
- âœ… Safari (especially on macOS/iOS)
- âœ… Firefox
- âœ… Edge

## Recording Issues

### Screenshots
- Use macOS: `Cmd+Shift+4` to capture area
- Use Windows: `Win+Shift+S` to capture area
- Annotate with arrows/highlights if helpful

### Screen Recordings
- macOS: `Cmd+Shift+5` â†’ Record Selected Portion
- Windows: Xbox Game Bar (`Win+G`) â†’ Record
- Chrome Extension: [Loom](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/loom) (free)

## Severity Levels

- ðŸ”´ **Critical**: Site is broken, feature completely non-functional
- ðŸŸ  **High**: Major issue affecting user experience
- ðŸŸ¡ **Medium**: Noticeable issue but doesn't block core functionality  
- ðŸŸ¢ **Low**: Minor polish or nice-to-have improvements

## Review Checklist

Use this checklist when reviewing pages:

### Home Page (`/`)
- [ ] Greetings overlay shows and dismisses correctly
- [ ] Hero "Start" button works
- [ ] Scroll-driven animations (Rotating text, Final reveal, Logo screen)
- [ ] Services section swipes/scrolls horizontally
- [ ] Trust section cards are swipeable
- [ ] Contact form fields are functional
- [ ] Header menu opens/closes
- [ ] Social links work
- [ ] Footer displays correctly

### About Page (`/about`)
- [ ] Breadcrumb shows "Home > About Us"
- [ ] All sections render (Story, Purpose, Team, Awards, Brand/Impact)
- [ ] Team member cards display properly
- [ ] Contact section and footer at bottom
